title: Raisin Nut Text
content:
Christian, it's gorgeous. Mr Peberton was right, has some Candida-ishness of sorts. I also agree with Hrant about the lc. "j"   
   
One last thing: the ligatures are wrong. Yours are not ffi and fi but f(long s)i and (long s)i.   
   
where's the italic? ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416171542im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Kai
author: anonymous
